title: How do I implement Unity Advertisements into my game?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I want to implement Unity Ads into my game project, however I do not know where to start.

sections.title: Cause
content: You may feel that you and your users would benefit from having advertisements shown in your Unity game. This can help you monetize your game and give your players the chance to earn rewards without making in-app purchases.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You will find guides for implementing Unity ads into your native Android and iOS applications here: Integration Guide - Android - iOS
